title: Grand Theft Auto IV final crack 1.0.3.0.zip
description:
The GTA IV working crack.Includes all updates(1.0.1.0, 1.0.2.0, 1.0.3.0).
I have uploaded this because people weren't happy with their framerate, and by installing game patches you need new crack files.So, you have now increased fps, just install those updates.

Copy 1911.dll, LaunchGTAIV.exe, xlive.dll into GTA IV directory.

* Have fun!


PS. You must launch the game by using LaunchGTAIV.exe not GTAIV.exe !!!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

****SAVEGAMES****

1) Ok, now you must find your savegame files:
- (for Windows Vista) DISK: > Users > *Your user* > AppData > Local - there you`ll see folder "Rockstar Games"

2) In this folder is GTAIV > savegemes > find your savegame files named "SGTA4.." and copy them all!

3) Now paste them to the new GTA IV savegames location:

- (for Windows Vista) %USERPROFILE% > Documents > Rockstar Games > GTA IV > savegames
- (for Windows XP) %USERPROFILE% > My Documents > Rockstar Games > GTA IV > savegames

****ONLINE****

This crack disables GFWL and RGSC, so online won't work !!!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Thanks to Razor1911 for GTA IV 1.02 crack and thanks to Rick and Seemann for XLiveLess.
